title: pfhismgrpg
author: pfhismgrpg
content: Hi,I want to pay someone for the service of looking through various crypto sports betting websites and looking for various markets. Will need someone to do this for me on a fortnightly basis. Will pay via BTC/ETH.Please reply if interested.
